name: RESINNO BIOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
TraveLibro is an app designed to help top travel bloggers and power travellers reach a wider audience through visual storytelling; capturing all the details of their trip in a chronological timeline using photos, videos, text, locations and reviews.
In today's world where people are posting different parts of their travel experiences on their Facebook (photo albums), Instagram (single photos), and Twitter (information/commentary) there lacks one digestible medium which streamlines an entire trip experience and helps in discovering this detailed visual content by relevant travellers. TraveLibro is solving that problem.
Top Travel Influencers like Do You Travel (Jack Morris - Global Following > 3.5M), Gypsea Lust (Lauren Bullen - Global Following > 2.5M), Tara Milk Tea (Global Following > 1.5M), Izkiz (Jennifer Tuffen - Global Following > 3M), Jacob Riglin (Global Following > 1M), Moonstruck Traveller (Sarah Kohan - Global Following > 1.5M), and many more use TraveLibro to share all the details of their journey.
It is the best way for them to share their journeys (with photos, videos, locations and text) and the easiest way for other travellers to get inspiration for their next journey.
TraveLibro is their 21st century travel diary / travel journal / travel blog.
DISCOVER JOURNEYS
Travellers can find the best journeys by top travel bloggers and power travellers based on their destination or category of interests. TraveLibro hosts thousands of professional journeys to inspire them to explore the world.
CAPTURE LIVE JOURNEYS
Power travellers can engage with their audience by capturing their live journeys on the go with the help of photos, videos, text, locations, ratings and reviews to share all the details of a trip. They can add trip travellers to their journeys to create memories together and contribute to the same journey.
UPLOAD PAST JOURNEYS
Power travellers can easily upload their past journeys automatically or personalise them to share all their travel experiences in one place.
10 REASONS WHY YOU SHOULD DOWNLOAD THE APP
Discover the worlds best journeys
Access a community of top travel bloggers & power travellers
Daily escapism with rich and immersive travel content
Easily capture your live travels with trip travellers
Upload your past stories automatically
Stories easily shared on other networks
Relive all your travel journeys and moments in one place
Great offline features
Full privacy control
Minimum battery consumption
name: TRAVELIBRO ONLINE PRIVATE LIMITED
